snippet: The new film “Samsara,” with its flowing global imagery, aims for something more poetic than most social documentary.
abstract: Ron Fricke film Samsara aims for something more poetic than most social documentary, with its flowing global imagery; says film is more about feelings and an inner journey than an intellectual experience.
lead_paragraph: The new film “Samsara,” with its flowing global imagery, aims for something more poetic than most social documentary.

headline.seo: ‘Samsara,’ Ron Fricke’s Cinematic Portrait of the Globe
headline.main: Planetary Poetry, Woven Into a Movie
headline.print_headline: Planetary Poetry, Woven Into a Movie
